CancelResourceRequest.name: CancelResourceRequest
CancelResourceRequest.description: Grants permission to cancel resource requests in your account

CreateResource.name: CreateResource
CreateResource.description: Grants permission to create resources in your account

DeleteResource.name: DeleteResource
DeleteResource.description: Grants permission to delete resources in your account

GetResource.name: GetResource
GetResource.description: Grants permission to get resources in your account

GetResourceRequestStatus.name: GetResourceRequestStatus
GetResourceRequestStatus.description: Grants permission to get resource requests in your account

ListResourceRequests.name: ListResourceRequests
ListResourceRequests.description: Grants permission to list resource requests in your account

ListResources.name: ListResources
ListResources.description: Grants permission to list resources in your account

UpdateResource.name: UpdateResource
UpdateResource.description: Grants permission to update resources in your account

ActivateOrganizationsAccess.name: ActivateOrganizationsAccess
ActivateOrganizationsAccess.description: Grants permission to activate trusted access between StackSets and Organizations. With trusted access between StackSets and Organizations activated, the management account has permissions to create and manage StackSets for your organization

ActivateType.name: ActivateType
ActivateType.description: Grants permission to activate a public third-party extension, making it available for use in stack templates

BatchDescribeTypeConfigurations.name: BatchDescribeTypeConfigurations
BatchDescribeTypeConfigurations.description: Grants permission to return configuration data for the specified CloudFormation extensions

CancelUpdateStack.name: CancelUpdateStack
CancelUpdateStack.description: Grants permission to cancel an update on the specified stack

ContinueUpdateRollback.name: ContinueUpdateRollback
ContinueUpdateRollback.description: Grants permission to continue rolling back a stack that is in the UPDATE_ROLLBACK_FAILED state to the UPDATE_ROLLBACK_COMPLETE state

CreateChangeSet.name: CreateChangeSet
CreateChangeSet.description: Grants permission to create a list of changes for a stack

CreateGeneratedTemplate.name: CreateGeneratedTemplate
CreateGeneratedTemplate.description: Grants permission to create a template from existing resources that are not already managed with CloudFormation

CreateStack.name: CreateStack
CreateStack.description: Grants permission to create a stack as specified in the template

CreateStackInstances.name: CreateStackInstances
CreateStackInstances.description: Grants permission to create stack instances for the specified accounts, within the specified regions

CreateStackSet.name: CreateStackSet
CreateStackSet.description: Grants permission to create a stackset as specified in the template

CreateUploadBucket.name: CreateUploadBucket
CreateUploadBucket.description: Grants permission to upload templates to Amazon S3 buckets. Used only by the AWS CloudFormation console and is not documented in the API reference

DeactivateOrganizationsAccess.name: DeactivateOrganizationsAccess
DeactivateOrganizationsAccess.description: Grants permission to deactivate trusted access between StackSets and Organizations. If trusted access is deactivated, the management account does not have permissions to create and manage service-managed StackSets for your organization

DeactivateType.name: DeactivateType
DeactivateType.description: Grants permission to deactivate a public extension that was previously activated in this account and region

DeleteChangeSet.name: DeleteChangeSet
DeleteChangeSet.description: Grants permission to delete the specified change set. Deleting change sets ensures that no one executes the wrong change set

DeleteGeneratedTemplate.name: DeleteGeneratedTemplate
DeleteGeneratedTemplate.description: Grants permission to delete a generated template

DeleteStack.name: DeleteStack
DeleteStack.description: Grants permission to delete a specified stack

DeleteStackInstances.name: DeleteStackInstances
DeleteStackInstances.description: Grants permission to delete stack instances for the specified accounts, in the specified regions

DeleteStackSet.name: DeleteStackSet
DeleteStackSet.description: Grants permission to delete a specified stackset

DeregisterType.name: DeregisterType
DeregisterType.description: Grants permission to deregister an existing CloudFormation type or type version

DescribeAccountLimits.name: DescribeAccountLimits
DescribeAccountLimits.description: Grants permission to retrieve your account's AWS CloudFormation limits

DescribeChangeSet.name: DescribeChangeSet
DescribeChangeSet.description: Grants permission to return the description for the specified change set

DescribeChangeSetHooks.name: DescribeChangeSetHooks
DescribeChangeSetHooks.description: Grants permission to return the Hook invocation information for the specified change set

DescribeGeneratedTemplate.name: DescribeGeneratedTemplate
DescribeGeneratedTemplate.description: Grants permission to describe a generated template. The output includes details about the progress of the creation of a generated template

DescribeOrganizationsAccess.name: DescribeOrganizationsAccess
DescribeOrganizationsAccess.description: Grants permission to return information about the account's OrganizationAccess status

DescribePublisher.name: DescribePublisher
DescribePublisher.description: Grants permission to return information about a CloudFormation extension publisher

DescribeResourceScan.name: DescribeResourceScan
DescribeResourceScan.description: Grants permission to describe details of a resource scan

DescribeStackDriftDetectionStatus.name: DescribeStackDriftDetectionStatus
DescribeStackDriftDetectionStatus.description: Grants permission to return information about a stack drift detection operation

DescribeStackEvents.name: DescribeStackEvents
DescribeStackEvents.description: Grants permission to return all stack related events for a specified stack

DescribeStackInstance.name: DescribeStackInstance
DescribeStackInstance.description: Grants permission to return the stack instance that's associated with the specified stack set, AWS account, and region

DescribeStackResource.name: DescribeStackResource
DescribeStackResource.description: Grants permission to return a description of the specified resource in the specified stack

DescribeStackResourceDrifts.name: DescribeStackResourceDrifts
DescribeStackResourceDrifts.description: Grants permission to return drift information for the resources that have been checked for drift in the specified stack

DescribeStackResources.name: DescribeStackResources
DescribeStackResources.description: Grants permission to return AWS resource descriptions for running and deleted stacks

DescribeStackSet.name: DescribeStackSet
DescribeStackSet.description: Grants permission to return the description of the specified stack set

DescribeStackSetOperation.name: DescribeStackSetOperation
DescribeStackSetOperation.description: Grants permission to return the description of the specified stack set operation

DescribeStacks.name: DescribeStacks
DescribeStacks.description: Grants permission to return the description for the specified stack, and to all stacks when used in combination with the ListStacks action

DescribeType.name: DescribeType
DescribeType.description: Grants permission to return information about the CloudFormation type requested

DescribeTypeRegistration.name: DescribeTypeRegistration
DescribeTypeRegistration.description: Grants permission to return information about the registration process for a CloudFormation type

DetectStackDrift.name: DetectStackDrift
DetectStackDrift.description: Grants permission to detects whether a stack's actual configuration differs, or has drifted, from it's expected configuration, as defined in the stack template and any values specified as template parameters

DetectStackResourceDrift.name: DetectStackResourceDrift
DetectStackResourceDrift.description: Grants permission to return information about whether a resource's actual configuration differs, or has drifted, from it's expected configuration, as defined in the stack template and any values specified as template parameters

DetectStackSetDrift.name: DetectStackSetDrift
DetectStackSetDrift.description: Grants permission to enable users to detect drift on a stack set and the stack instances that belong to that stack set

EstimateTemplateCost.name: EstimateTemplateCost
EstimateTemplateCost.description: Grants permission to return the estimated monthly cost of a template

ExecuteChangeSet.name: ExecuteChangeSet
ExecuteChangeSet.description: Grants permission to update a stack using the input information that was provided when the specified change set was created

GetGeneratedTemplate.name: GetGeneratedTemplate
GetGeneratedTemplate.description: Grants permission to retrieve a generated template

GetStackPolicy.name: GetStackPolicy
GetStackPolicy.description: Grants permission to return the stack policy for a specified stack

GetTemplate.name: GetTemplate
GetTemplate.description: Grants permission to return the template body for a specified stack

GetTemplateSummary.name: GetTemplateSummary
GetTemplateSummary.description: Grants permission to return information about a new or existing template

ImportStacksToStackSet.name: ImportStacksToStackSet
ImportStacksToStackSet.description: Grants permission to enable users to import existing stacks to a new or existing stackset

ListChangeSets.name: ListChangeSets
ListChangeSets.description: Grants permission to return the ID and status of each active change set for a stack. For example, AWS CloudFormation lists change sets that are in the CREATE_IN_PROGRESS or CREATE_PENDING state

ListExports.name: ListExports
ListExports.description: Grants permission to list all exported output values in the account and region in which you call this action

ListGeneratedTemplates.name: ListGeneratedTemplates
ListGeneratedTemplates.description: Grants permission to list your generated templates in this Region

ListImports.name: ListImports
ListImports.description: Grants permission to list all stacks that are importing an exported output value

ListResourceScanRelatedResources.name: ListResourceScanRelatedResources
ListResourceScanRelatedResources.description: Grants permission to list the related resources for a list of resources from a resource scan. The response indicates whether each returned resource is already managed by CloudFormation

ListResourceScanResources.name: ListResourceScanResources
ListResourceScanResources.description: Grants permission to list the resources from a resource scan. The results can be filtered by resource identifier, resource type prefix, tag key, and tag value

ListResourceScans.name: ListResourceScans
ListResourceScans.description: Grants permission to list the resource scans from newest to oldest. By default it will return up to 10 resource scans

ListStackInstanceResourceDrifts.name: ListStackInstanceResourceDrifts
ListStackInstanceResourceDrifts.description: Grants permission to return drift information for the resources that have been checked for drift in the specified stack instance

ListStackInstances.name: ListStackInstances
ListStackInstances.description: Grants permission to return summary information about stack instances that are associated with the specified stack set

ListStackResources.name: ListStackResources
ListStackResources.description: Grants permission to return descriptions of all resources of the specified stack

ListStackSetAutoDeploymentTargets.name: ListStackSetAutoDeploymentTargets
ListStackSetAutoDeploymentTargets.description: Grants permission to return summary information about StackSet Auto Deployment Targets

ListStackSetOperationResults.name: ListStackSetOperationResults
ListStackSetOperationResults.description: Grants permission to return summary information about the results of a stack set operation

ListStackSetOperations.name: ListStackSetOperations
ListStackSetOperations.description: Grants permission to return summary information about operations performed on a stack set

ListStackSets.name: ListStackSets
ListStackSets.description: Grants permission to return summary information about stack sets that are associated with the user

ListStacks.name: ListStacks
ListStacks.description: Grants permission to return the summary information for stacks whose status matches the specified StackStatusFilter. In combination with the DescribeStacks action, grants permission to list descriptions for stacks

ListTypeRegistrations.name: ListTypeRegistrations
ListTypeRegistrations.description: Grants permission to list CloudFormation type registration attempts

ListTypeVersions.name: ListTypeVersions
ListTypeVersions.description: Grants permission to list versions of a particular CloudFormation type

ListTypes.name: ListTypes
ListTypes.description: Grants permission to list available CloudFormation types

PublishType.name: PublishType
PublishType.description: Grants permission to publish the specified extension to the CloudFormation registry as a public extension in this region

RecordHandlerProgress.name: RecordHandlerProgress
RecordHandlerProgress.description: Grants permission to record the handler progress

RegisterPublisher.name: RegisterPublisher
RegisterPublisher.description: Grants permission to register account as a publisher of public extensions in the CloudFormation registry

RegisterType.name: RegisterType
RegisterType.description: Grants permission to register a new CloudFormation type

RollbackStack.name: RollbackStack
RollbackStack.description: Grants permission to rollback the stack to the last stable state

SetStackPolicy.name: SetStackPolicy
SetStackPolicy.description: Grants permission to set a stack policy for a specified stack

SetTypeConfiguration.name: SetTypeConfiguration
SetTypeConfiguration.description: Grants permission to set the configuration data for a registered CloudFormation extension, in the given account and region

SetTypeDefaultVersion.name: SetTypeDefaultVersion
SetTypeDefaultVersion.description: Grants permission to set which version of a CloudFormation type applies to CloudFormation operations

SignalResource.name: SignalResource
SignalResource.description: Grants permission to send a signal to the specified resource with a success or failure status

StartResourceScan.name: StartResourceScan
StartResourceScan.description: Grants permission to start a scan of the resources in this account in this Region

StopStackSetOperation.name: StopStackSetOperation
StopStackSetOperation.description: Grants permission to stop an in-progress operation on a stack set and its associated stack instances

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag cloudformation resources

TestType.name: TestType
TestType.description: Grants permission to test a registered extension to make sure it meets all necessary requirements for being published in the CloudFormation registry

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag cloudformation resources

UpdateGeneratedTemplate.name: UpdateGeneratedTemplate
UpdateGeneratedTemplate.description: Grants permission to update a generated template. This can be used to change the name, add and remove resources, refresh resources, and change the DeletionPolicy and UpdateReplacePolicy settings

UpdateStack.name: UpdateStack
UpdateStack.description: Grants permission to update a stack as specified in the template

UpdateStackInstances.name: UpdateStackInstances
UpdateStackInstances.description: Grants permission to update the parameter values for stack instances for the specified accounts, within the specified regions

UpdateStackSet.name: UpdateStackSet
UpdateStackSet.description: Grants permission to update a stackset as specified in the template

UpdateTerminationProtection.name: UpdateTerminationProtection
UpdateTerminationProtection.description: Grants permission to update termination protection for the specified stack

ValidateTemplate.name: ValidateTemplate
ValidateTemplate.description: Grants permission to validate a specified template
